data.title: Booking Info for Speaking Engagements
data.meta_description: Biography of Annie Potts. Find fees and other booking information for Annie Potts speaking engagements and appearances at live and virtual events.
data.text:
Annie Potts (born October 28, 1952) is an American television, film and stage actress. She is known for her roles in popular 1980s films such as Ghostbusters (1984), Ghostbusters II (1989), Pretty in Pink (1986), Jumpin' Jack Flash (1986) and Who's Harry Crumb? (1989). In the 1990s, she voiced Bo Peep in the animated films Toy Story (1995) and Toy Story 2 (1999). She did not return to voice Bo Peep in Toy Story 3 (2010), but she will likely return as Bo in Toy Story 4. She is also known for playing Mary Jo Jackson Shively on the CBS sitcom Designing Women (1986–93).

Potts was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1994 for playing Dana Palladino on the CBS sitcom Love & War (1993–95), and was nominated for a Screen Actors Guild Award in 1998 and 1999 for playing Mary Elizabeth Sims in the Lifetime drama series Any Day Now (1998–2002). In 2012, she starred as Gigi Stopper on the ABC comedy-drama series GCB.
